name: Mike Minor
description:
–
I smile often, laugh a lot, and find joy in the simple things of life. My friends would describe me as kind, caring, and friendly. When I believe in a cause, I can be very passionate about it. I express myself very easily and love to hear what others have to say as well. Bottom line, I am a communicator. I am very sociable, affectionate, and loving. I love to read, write, travel, and spend time with family and friends
